name: Buy/Sell
notes: Buy/sell instruments existing in the system
display_expr: str(trade_type)+': '+format_number(transactions[0].position_size_with_sign, decimal_pos=2, thousand_sep=' ', use_grouping=True)+' of '+transactions[0].instrument.name+' Cash: '+format_number(transactions[0].cash_consideration, decimal_pos=2, thousand_sep=' ', use_grouping=True)+' to '+transactions[0].portfolio.user_code
